price: 97. Mana karin (Yajuuj iyo Ma'juuj) inay ka soo kor baxaan mana karin inay duleeliyaan.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: famā is'ṭāʿū an yaẓharūhu wamā is'taṭāʿū lahu naqban
